1.content:
Within the space between universes, a powerful being existed. Omnipotent and omniscient, it saw all within every universe. But this being was bored, so chose the only form of entertainment it knew - interfering in the lives of the denizens of the various universes.

Breaking off small pieces of its essence, it scattered those pieces across the multiverse. When they entered a world, these pieces would take various forms - crystals, stones, playing cards, machines, etc - and would have even more varied effects. Any beings who touched these items would find themselves facing changes to their clothes, their bodies, their minds... some would even be taken from their own worlds and be sent to others.

The entity would watch these changes, and it would be amused.

Now the only question was, what world and people do we watch change?
1.title: Choose a series

111.content:
It was a beautiful and seemingly ordinary day in Domino City. Unnoticed by anyone in the city, there was a small flash of light in the sky that soon resolved into a Duel Monster card. Specifically, an otherwise blank spell card, which floated slowly down through the air until it landed on the ground.

The card sat there, completely unnoticed, until someone came along and picked it up.

Who was it?

1113322221.content:
Mokuba was humming to himself. KaibaLand's mainframe had taken some damage during Zigfried von Schroeder's attempted attack, but it was all fixed now; in part due to Mokuba's own computer skills.

Satisfied that everything was in proper working order again, Mokuba left the Mainframe Hub to tell his brother, Seto, that the system was up and running once more and that KaibaLand could open again very soon.

The moment that Mokuba stepped outside, his eyes caught sight of a lone Duel Monsters Card on the ground.

"That's weird," said Mokuba to himself. "What's that card doing here? It's not one of Seto's; he would never throw any of his cards away..."

Out of curiosity, Mokuba went and picked up the card. The instant that he did, there was a bright flash from the card, forcing Mokuba to shield his eyes.

Little did he know that the card would change him in all sorts of strange ways...

What happens to Mokuba?

121322122.content:
Maybe T.K. gains the abillity to change the age of himself and others, by removing an amount of years from one or more people, making said people younger, and adding them to one person, making that person older?

For example, T.K. could choose to first remove 4 years from the 10-year old Matt, making Matt a 6-year old, then add those 4 years to his own 7-year old self, making T.K. an 11-year old; or take away 3 years from the 8-year old Kari, making Kari a 5-year old, and then add those 3 years to the 10-year old Tai, making Tai a 13-year old.

T.K. could also choose to remove 4 years from each of the other Digidestined, turning the 10-year old Tai into a 6-year old, the 10-year old Matt into a 6-year old, the 8-year old Kari into a 4-year old, the 11-year old Joe into a 7-year old, the 11-year old Sora into a 7-year old, the 9-year old Mimi into a 5-year old and the 9-year old Izzy into a 5-year old, and then adding all those 28 years to his own 7-year old self, turning T.K. into a 35-year old. ((4 times 7 = 28, 28 + 7 = 35.))

He can also choose to target the Digimon with either of those effects, in which case, depending on whether they get older or younger, they might end up Digivolving or De-Digivolving. For simplicities sake, in this story the Digimon in their Rookie Level are about 10 human years old each, they'll Digivolve to Champion at age 15, Ultimate at age 20 and Mega at age 25, and they'll De-Digivolve to In-Training at age 7, and into Fresh at age 4. So, by these parameters, T.K. could choose to remove 5 years each from both the 10-year old Agumon and the 10-year old Gabumon, making them both 5-year olds, causing them to De-Digivolve into Koromon and Tsunomon, and then add those 10 years to the 10-year old Patamon, making Patamon a 20-year old, causing Patamon to Digivolve into MagnaAngemon.

T.K. can also choose to mix and match between the ages of both humans and Digimon. So, T.K. could choose to remove 3 years from the 10-year old Agumon, turning Agumon into a 7-year old, causing Agumon to De-Digivolve into Koromon, then add those 3 years to his own 7-year old self, turning T.K. into a 10-year old. Or, he could remove 7 years from Tentomon, turning Tentomon into a 3-year old, causing Tentomon to De-Digivolve into Pabumon; remove 2 years from the 10-year old Matt, turning Matt into an 8-year old; remove 1 year from the 10-year old Tai, turning Tai into a 9-year old; remove 3 years from the 10-year old Gomamon, turning Gomamon into a 7-year old, causing Gomamon to De-Digivolve into Bukamon; and then add those 13 years to his own 7-year old self, turning T.K. into a 20-year old.
((7 + 2 + 1 + 3 = 13, 13 + 7 = 20.))

Please note, that T.K. cannot add years to someone he has just removed years from, (like, if he takes 2 years away from both the 10-year old Tai and the 10-year old Matt, turning both of them into 8-year olds, he cannot add those 4 years to either the 8-year old Tai or the 8-year old Matt), but he can add or remove years from someone, even if that someone is currently not their usual age. (So, to use the previous example, T.K. can choose to remove a further 4 years from the 8-year old Matt, turning Matt into a 4-year old, and then add those 4 years to the 8-year old Tai, turning Tai into a 12-year old.)

Also; T.K. cannot, I repeat, CANNOT use this power to unbirth any of his targets! They always, ALWAYS, keep at least 1 year for themselves and cannot go any younger than that!

Finally; no matter what age they might end up at, the people affected by this abillity will ALWAYS keep their regular mental age; it's only their physical age that will change. Ergo; even if T.K. removes 7 years from the 10-year old Tai, turning Tai into a 3-year old; and then removes 3 years from the 10-year old Agumon, turning Agumon into a 7-year old, causing Agumon to De-Digivolve into Koromon; then adding those 10 years to his 7-year old self, turning T.K. into a 17-year old, Tai still has his normal 10-year old mind inside his new 3-year old body, and even though Agumon has De-Digivolved into Koromon, it's only his physical age that have changed, meaning he is still the 10-year old Agumon inside the body of the 7-year old Koromon. Plus; even though T.K. has turned into a 17-year old, he is still his normal 7-year old self mentally.

So, how about it?

14431222212.content:
Okay; so you want Aang to swap bodies with one of the many animals in the series!
But, what kind of animal is it?

Let's begin with the first two named animal characters that we see; Appa and Momo.

Appa is the flying bison serving as Aang's animal guide and spirit companion that Aang and his friends also use as their main mode of transportation.

Momo is the Winged Lemur that the group found at the Southern Air Temple.

Whichever one of them that Aang swaps with, things are going to get very awkward. Aang would likely struggle with getting used to flying in either of their bodies, not to mention the significant change in size that he would experience, too, (since Appa is much bigger than he normally is and Momo is much smaller).

On the other end of the scale, it seems highly probable that both Appa and Momo would be having trouble being in Aang's body.
Even though they are both rather intelligent animals, it seems doubtful that either of them would be smart enough to get completely used to Aang's human body.

Momo might be somewhat able to move around relatively 'normal', since he has a similar body-type to a human, although his new size might cause a few problems.

Appa on the other hand, would likely have significant difficulties with getting used to Aang's body. Having just four limbs instead of six, as well as walking on two legs would be the things that he would struggle getting used to the most, as well as his new, smaller size.

In spite of their intelligence, though, they are still animals, with all of their habits and instincts; which would cause extremely awkward incidents if they were to swap bodies with Aang.
Momo might try to climb a tree to get some fruit, only for the branch he's standing on to break because of Aang's body's greater weight, whereas Appa might suddenly get Aang's body down on all fours as he attempts to eat some grass.

But; enough rambling. Which of these two animal do you want Aang to swap bodies with?

1443322212.content:
Zuko was furious.

This was not a new occurrence by any means.

But at this particular moment, he was furious about a new set of circumstances.

“You can’t make me drink this... filth, uncle!”

He was hissing, red in the face, as the two of them kept secluded in the dark of the woods. Iroh was stirring a cup of tea calmly. He was used to his nephew’s fury by now.

“You should drink some tea regardless of our circumstances, Prince Zuko. It will soothe your nerves.”

“Uncle! What you’re suggesting is... it’s disgraceful! A denial of our fire nation blood!”

The old man sighed wearily. “Unfortunately, it is a price we must pay. Besides, we have already been banished. There is little worse they can do to us.”

That wasn’t necessarily true. Zuko felt a familiar lump in his throat that he tried to ignore. Zuko was the one who was banished. His uncle got dragged into dishonor with him.

Like most things, the current situation was his own fault.

“Uncle, we... we don’t have to do this. We can find some other kind of disguise. They won’t find us in Ba Sing Se.”

“Even if we are safe from the Fire Nation in Ba Sing Se, they won’t have forgotten my own crimes.”

Iroh lifted up the tea carefully, letting the steam waft into the air. “This tea is the most efficient disguise we have at our disposal. It will keep both Azula and the Earth Kingdom from discovering us.”

“But... wouldn’t it denounce our loyalty to father?”

Iroh knew it was still too soon to be too overt in his criticisms. Zuko wasn’t ready. But he allowed a little righteous anger to slip through. “My brother turned on us first. For now, this will have to do.”

Zuko didn’t want to stomach that. And he didn’t want to stomach the spiritual tea Uncle had brought before them.

But there were few other options. The boats were leaving soon.

Zuko lifted up his tea, as did his uncle.

And they drank down its contents.

For honor.
1443322212.title: Zuko the Fugitive

choices: Zuko meets Jet on the ferry
Niece and Aunt can’t find a cure in Ba Sing Se
14433222121.content:
Zuko was always surprised exactly how much the universe could hurt him. Every time he thought he’d finally suffered enough, another punishment for such hubris was right around the corner.

The changes were... painful. Yet not painful. As his body altered and shifted, changed into new, unfamiliar ways, there was a sensation that... well, he wasn’t going to think about precisely how it felt. The implications of the not-pain were disturbing enough already without taking into account exactly how his body had altered. He had little time to consider anything remotely similar to not-pain over the past three years of exile.

He hadn’t really thought about girls at all in the past three years.

There was Mai. There was the water bending girl. There were the warriors on Kyoshi Island. And there was the hunter Uncle had insisted on flirting with. That was the sum total of girls Zuko had even had the need to think about in the years past.

Unfortunately, it seemed he was going to have to think about girls a lot more now.

His clothes barely fit anymore. Tight in the chest and too big everywhere. While the spare clothes Iroh’s “friends” loaned them seemed to be more appropriate, it still wasn’t quite up to proper measurement.

It was also, it bearer repeating, completely humiliating.

As Uncle dealt with passports, Zuko did his best not to scream at any staring passerby. He couldn’t help but think, no matter who was looking, that they knew. Around the corner, any second now, Azula would come point and laugh. “Oh, Zuzu, I didn’t know you wanted to be me that bad!”

The Crown Prince of the Fire Nation, dressed up and altered to be a teenage girl, hiding in the Earth Kingdom’s most secure city.

Every single element was a slap to the face of his royal bloodline.

As they walked towards the ferry, Zuko couldn’t help but notice all the ways his body was wrong now. The way it swayed. The way hair fell in front of his eyes. The way it bounced.

He glanced into the ocean, peering at his reflection. It was like right after his Agni Kai. His shame and failure on display for everyone to see.

And worst of all, it didn’t even heal his scar. The one mercy he had dared hope for.

His hair fell over it naturally. The smallest of tiniest of benefits.

“Don’t fret now, Zuko.” A kind whisper from Uncle as always. It was infuriating. As always. “Once we’re in the city, we can cure ourselves and fix our passports safely.”

He couldn’t help but think Uncle was enjoying this. And why wouldn’t he? Uncle may have transformed as well, but people weren’t looking at “her” the same way they looked at Zuko. By turning into an old woman, Uncle gained hair and sympathy from onlookers. People shaking their heads and the poor old woman escaping from the Fire Nation.

By turning into a girl, Zuko lost the same fighting balance he knew and gained admirers.

Sighing in frustration, “she” blew some hair out of her face. Please. Spirits. There’s no way you could possibly make this any worse...
14433222121.title: Princess Zuko

choices: Another offer to join the Fighters
Jet catches onto the firebenders truth
144332221211.content:
"I think the crew suspects us, Uncle."

"Its 'Auntie', Li."

Zuko glared. "I'm not-"

"The two syllables make it easier, my niece. Its an easier transition."

Somehow, she didn't think syllables were the problem. "Whatever, Auntie. We've got more important problems."

"What makes you think they know?"

"That crew member told me the Captain keeps a better stash of food in his personal quarters. He offered to bring me some."

"Well, that's kind of him."

"But he wanted me to go somewhere private with him first."

Aunt Iroh blanched immediately.

"It has to be a trap. They must-"

"No, Li, I think this is something else. But its best to be wary around him. Don't go anywhere with him alone."

"That food part sounds promising though."

The two royals froze. Neither of them had said a word. It was a young man, grass in his mouth, grinning at them.

"Maybe we should ask the good Captain to offer some of that food to the rest of us."

----------------------------------------------------------------

From what Zuko could tell, Jet hadn't heard their entire conversation. Just the part he considered relevant to launch his personal heist. Before long, the refugees were eating on delicious, nutritious food rather than the gruel they'd been served before.

Zuko wasn't used to seeing people happy with something she'd done. It was... a strange feeling. Almost terrifying. She shouldn't be here. Her father would be furious if he saw her like this. If he saw her-

"That was incredible work, Li."

The fake name and the jovial tone burst through the panic. She glared at his smug, smirking face. "I did what needed to be done."

"Not everyone understands that. Some people are content to sit by or do nothing."

She snorted, moving to stand by the edge of the ferry. "Doing what I'm told has never been my strong suit."

She thought she was good at it, once. But no matter what rules she followed, it never seemed to be the right one.

Jet leaned against the ferry edge next to her. "So tell me. How does a girl like you get that good at stealing?"

"None of your business."

"Its just friendly conversation."

"We're not friends."

"Harsh." Jet lifted up a finger, as if catching onto an idea. "Alright. Let's make a game of it."

Eyes narrowed. Zuko was bad at games. Or maybe she was good at them. She had only ever really played with Azula and Azula always cheated. Azula never followed the rules and got rewarded for it. Zuko did everything by the book and it was never right.

The truth was, the game was always rigged in Ozai's house.

"...what kind of game?"

"You ask me a question. I'll answer. Then I'll ask you ask me a question. I'll answer."

Zuko searched the words for hidden twists or lies. There was always a catch in these things. Jet didn't promise the answer would be the truth. And he wasn't making her promise that either. The entire conversation could just be lies. Maybe all conversations were just lies.

...Still. Getting any kind of answer might be worthwhile.

"...fine. Why are you bothering me?"

He laughed in amusement. "Because I'm interested in you. Where are you from, Li?"

Images of training Lee in the middle of the night flashed into her mind. "A pig farm."

"You? A pig farmer?"

"Not your turn. Why are you interested in me?"

"Because you've been in a fight." Noticing her scowl, he backtracked. "Not because of the obvious reasons. You're athletic. Fast. Experienced. You've been in fights. So where'd Li the pig farmer learned to fight?"

She couldn't tell him she had tutors. She'd say her Uncle, but then he'd ask "where's your Aunt's husband" and she wouldn't have a lie for that. That left...

"My cousin. And self-trained."

Images of Lu Ten, helping Zuko with his technique. His smile and laugh at family dinners. How quiet it got when he left for the war. How quieter it got when he didn't come back.

"Where's your cousin now?"

"You're cheating." It was a stupid complaint, but it bugged her. There had to be a structure. That was her only salvation in it all. "Why are you going to Ba Sing Se?"

"Same reason as everyone else. A second chance. Where's your-" But he stopped, reconsidering. "Why'd you leave the farm?"

Images of Lee, screaming at him. Throwing the knife away. Eyes full of hate. "Town was getting overtaxed by soldiers. I fought them. People didn't like how I did it. I left. What'd you do, Jet?"

He blinked at the sheer bluntness of it all. But he relaxed some tension in his posture. "Made a choice. People nearly died. Freedom Fighters split up. Just us now."

There was more in that Zuko could relate to then she liked.

Jet nodded in the direction of Uncle, Smellerbee, and Longshot. "You had to leave town. Why's your aunt with you?"

"...She's always been there for me. We're all we have left."

Jet nodded, respectfully. "I can understand that. Its noble."

Noble. She almost hated the word by now. Noble made her uncle miserable. Stuck with a worthless nephew who ruined everything. "If you want a second chance, why are you interested in a fighter?"

"Lots of people in Ba Sing Se need help. Maybe helping is something the Freedom Fighters can do. And we could use more of it."

"Not interested."

"Its still open. Maybe you'll change your mind after you see the city."

"Doubtful."

"You ever have a boyfriend?"

All other thoughts jolted out of Zuko's mind immediately. Replaced only with wild panic and confusion. "W-what?"

His grin was annoyingly wide and smug. "Boyfriend. You. Ever. Have."

"That's not- you-" She was already a mess of sputters. "No! I mean- that's none of your business!"

His smile only got wider at her anger. "C'mon, honest question! Since you clearly didn't know how to handle that sailor flirting with you either."

"He wasn't- that- I don't have to stand here and- be mocked!" She started to storm off, but he grabbed her arm.

"C'mon, I'm just lightening the mood. There's no shaming here! The only shame is that someone hasn't scooped you u-"

She took that moment to punch him in the stomach. While he staggered backward, Zuko quickly stomped to the other end of the boat as quickly as possible.

She hated this boat. She hated this body. She hated this life.
144332221211.title: Zuko meets Jet on the ferry

1443322212111.content:
Jet was persistent, Zuko had to give him that. He would keep finding ways to bother “Li.” Asking more stupid questions, trying to get her to join his stupid club. It was agonizing. By the time they reached port, Zuko was ready to throw the boy overboard.

They all disembarked from the boat, refugees heading their separate ways. It was a new beginning for everyone. And Jet was still following them. He thought he was being stealthy, but he wasn’t.

After another threes block, Zuko finally turned to glare at him. “Quit following us. We don’t need each other anymore.”

Jet’s annoying smirk remained as it was. “Friends gotta stick together. It’d be good to keep in contact.”

“We’re not friends. You’re gonna make any place that would hire me think I have a stalker.”

He tapped his chin thoughtfully. “You make a point. Alright, how about another deal?”

Ugh. More games. “Not interested.”

“All I’m asking for is one night. After you get situated, one night working with me to see how much better it is. If you still say no, I’ll never bother you again.”

...that did sound promising. “Just one night?”

“One night. We’ll make it... two weeks from now. No, a month. Just to be safe.”

Zuko pondered the words. Jet was... usually a man of his word. And in a month, they’d be cured and Li would be gone. This was an easy escape.

“Fine. It’s a deal.”

—————————————-

They weren’t cured in a month. The fix to this... curse turned out to be harder to acquire than either of them expected.

And it was getting humiliating. At their tea shop, the owner insisted on Li wearing a skirt on the job. When Lie tried to protest, the owner threatened to fire both of them. So Li had to grin and bear the draft and the horrible, awful customers. The waggling eyebrows, the grabby hands, and stupid little comments.

A local girl latched onto Li quickly. At first, Zuko thought she was a spy. But she quickly realized than Jin was just a silly refugee girl. She talked too much and was way too annoying. But serving her meant Zuko wasn’t serving the men.

“You know Lin, some guy keeps checking in on you.”

“He can join the club,” she grumbled, filling another cup.

“No, this one’s not buying. Look.”

And indeed, there was Jet across the street, smug as ever. Zuko scowled.

“He’s kinda hot.”

“He’s trouble. He won’t leave me alone.”

“You can handle trouble. Besides, he’s a better option than the rest of your customers.”

“I’m not interested in options,” Zuko hissed at her. When would she get it through her thick head that she wasn’t up for “girl talk.”

“You can’t be alone forever! Besides, if someone recognizes you’re cute, I say go for it.”

“I’m not cute.”

“Are too! If you let me fix up your hair and get you a nice outfit just once-“

That did it. Zuko tossed her apron into the kitchen. And stomped off to find some kind of salvation from this nightmare.

As she slammed the door to their little hovel shut, she was forced to stare at the mirror Auntie had left in the hall. It was supposed to go in the bathroom, but neither of them had gotten around to it.

So Zuko was forced to see the reflection of Li.

Cute? Her? As if. No matter what she looked like, the scar marked her as hideous.

Still. She couldn’t help but regard herself carefully. The hips and chest... filled out the work dress nicely. It filled out most outfits nicely. No matter what she wore, no matter how plain, it seemed to catch someone’s attention.

A lot of people still looked away at the scar. But it didn’t bother others either. Her hair tended to naturally cover it up now, which seemed to give her a mysterious quality people liked.

People liked Li. A lot more than they liked Zuko.

She didn’t know how to feel about that. She didn’t know what to do with the fact that she felt... nice, sometimes.

Maybe this trip with Jet wouldn’t be that bad.
1443322212111.title: Jet Chasing After a Princess

15233221.content:
Ben, Gwen, and Kevin had their hands full with Dr. Animo and his giant mutated squirrels. The doctor had attacked a research station using the furry creatures, and Ben and company were there to stop him. As usual.

The lab was in shambles. All of the equipment lay in ruins. Chemicals and other unknown liquids were spilled across the tables and pouring out onto the floor. Kevin punched a squirrel to get it away from Gwen, then went flying as another squirrel knocked into him from behind. He stood up and grabbed one of the tables, absorbing the metal and not realizing he was also absorbing the chemicals on it. Armored up, he turned and hit another squirrel.

Gwen used her powers to keep the squirrels away, while Ben hit the ultramatrix and transformed into Big Chill. Big Chill then proceeded to put most of the squirrels on ice, sticking them to the floor. The three teens soon had the situation under control.

"Curse you Ben Tennyson!" cried Dr. Animo as he knew he had lost the battle again. "I, Dr. Animo, swear that next time I will destroy you!". He and his remaining squirrel jumped through an open window and scurried away before Ben or the others could stop them.

" Well, that's another afternoon wasted on stupidity," quipped Ben. "Anybody want to go grab Julie and head over to Mr. Smoothy's?" He and Gwen walked toward the door, Kevin following. All of a sudden, Kevin felt dizzy. The room was spinning and he had no idea why. What Kevin didn't realize was that the chemicals he had accidentally absorbed were starting to cause changes to his cellular structure.

152332212.title: Kevin starts to shrink.

choices: They take Kevin to Plumber HQ to see if Max can help.
An enemy shows up along the way.
1523322121.content:
Kevin was getting ready to follow Ben and Gwen out of the lab when he felt dizzy. He put his hand to his forehead.

"Hey guys? I feel strange."

Suddenly, Kevin started to shrink. Before the astonished gazes of his two friends, Kevin's size quickly diminished. Kevin could do nothing but look on as the room around him as well as Ben and Gwen seemed to be getting bigger and bigger as he shrank smaller and smaller. Kevin couldn't move as he vanished into his clothes, which had pooled around him. Gwen rushed over and carefully searched through the pile, gently lifting a still shrinking Kevin up and holding him in her open palm. As she and Ben continued to watch open-mouthed, they saw the now 12 inch Osmosion shrink even more. Kevin felt himself get tinier and tinier, shrinking from 12 inches down to 8 inches, then down to 4 inches, where the shrinking finally came to a stop.

Ben found his voice first. "Whoa. What just happened? Kevin, are you okay?"

Kevin glared up at his giant friend. No, I am not okay Tennyson! I'm smaller than a mouse!

Ben laughed. "Well, you sure sound like a mouse. Your voice is a high squeak. That's so cute!"

Kevin stamped his foot. "Cut it out or I'll....."

Ben grabbed the tiny teen out of Gwen's hand and held him in front of his face between two fingers. "Or what, Levin? Right now you're so insignificantly little you can't even reach my pinky from my thumb." He blew a breath and watched Kevin sway back and forth. "I gotta admit, this is kind of fun." He inspected Kevin as he held him. "Man, are you teeny tiny. I wonder what made you shrink SSSSSOOOOOOOOOO SSSMMMAAALLLL. Who knows? Maybe you'll shrink even more." He grinned.

Gwen glared at her cousin reproachfully. "Ben, cut it out. Stop being mean and teasing him and hand him back to me." Ben dropped Kevin into her palm. "Don't worry Kevin, we're going to find a way to fix this. I promise. Until then, I'll take care of you and make sure you're safe. Let's go talk to Grandpa Max and see if he can help."

"Yeah. And find out why I suddenly shrank in the first place. Thanks Gwen. I trust you.". the itty bitty Kevin replied. "I guess it could be worse. At least I'm bigger than an ant."

Gwen giggled. "That's a positive way of looking at it," she told him. "Listen, I need to put you somewhere safe for now. Plus, we'll find something for you to wear so you don't have to be naked. Until we get to Grandpa Max, I'll just keep you in my bra. Okay?" The miniature Kevin nodded. "Okay. Just keep me away from Tennyson." Gwen carefully dropped him in.

Ben looked like he was going to gag. "Ewww. I think I'm gonna barf." Then he brightened. "Hey! Can I play with him later?"

Gwen hit him on the back of the head. "No. Shut up. Now stop being a jerk, and let's go. You drive."

choices: new Vlad appears in Amity Park
new Vlad in his new ghost form, enters the Ghost Zone
15313222121211111.content:
Clockwork, the ghost of time, appeared in front of him.

Vlad stared wide-eyed at the ghost. He recognized him from his studies on ghosts, he knew very little about Clockwork, only the basics, that he could control time, that he had the ability to see the past and future and that he was without a doubt a very powerful being, even more so than the Ghost King.

But above all, he knew the blue entity in front of him was not evil.

"It's not possible…" he whispered in shock, "You're just a legend, a ghostly myth!"

Clockwork smirked, "You shouldn't believe everything you read… "

Vlad just continued to stare at him.

Clockwork raised an eyebrow as he became an old man. "For someone who has always had something to say, you are not very talkative now."

That seemed to snap Vlad out of his stupor. "Where am I?" he asked nervously.

"You are in the ghost zone. My clocktower, to be precise."

"But, what if-"
"Do not worry. This room is able to block ecto-signatures from other ghosts in the ghost zone, so you're safe here."

"Why did you... regress me to... my younger self?"

Clockwork shrugged as he morphed into a baby. "Yes, well, that was... a precaution. Just in case anyone saw you in your human form now, since no one wants you anywhere in the ghost zone or the human world."

Vlad looked down at his human self, stepping out of his baggy pants, shoes and socks, and shedding his huge suit jacket, revealing he was now only wearing a. he stroked his chin, where the stubble used to be.

"However," Clockwork said, shifting to his adult form, "there was... one thing."
"What was... it.?" Vlad asked hesitantly.

"The ghost energy from the proto-portal incident merged completely with your cellular structure when the disasteroid hit you. It caused a massive feedback loop in your DNA. AND NOW..."

Clockwork paused impressively..

"As of now, you will no longer age like you normally would."
Vlad's eyes popped. "What? So... you mean, I'm stuck like this... forever?!"

Clockwork nodded.
"Believe me, it takes some getting used to." he said, becoming a old man again.

"Danny must still be aging normally because he's still going through puberty at the time he had his accident." Vlad mused to himself.

Vlad stared at himself. At least I'm safe from angry mobs in both the human world and the Ghost Zone.

Clockwork provided the same clothes Vlad was wearing when he had his accident - white lab coat, yellow
shirt with green and white stripe on it, khaki jeans, and red and white hitop sneakers, onto him.

"Ummm...... do I still have my ghost powers?"

Clockwork nodded.

Just to be sure, Vlad went ghost to see himself.

his clothes inverted colours - black lab coat, blue shirt with pink and black stripe on it, blue-gray jeans, and blue and black hi-top sneakers. His skin was blue and his ears were pointed, like in his adult's ghost form, but his hair was bleached white.

he was a whole new Vlad masters.

155332122122222211212211.content:
"I was in a band." Bill said to Jordan. "Lead guitar."

"Cool." Jordan said. "I like bass."

"I played a lot of AC/DC." Bill said. and approximately at the exact same time, Jordan said, " My favourite band is AC/DC."

At that moment, they both gasped. Their eyes widened, and Jordan said, "Whaaaaat."

Bill's heart almost skipped a beat.

There was a bit of a silence, then suddenly, Bill let out a loud screech that was almost like a monkey's.

"What the-?" Jordan said. "Sorry." Bill said nervously, scratching at his chest and head. "I do tend to monkey around with my daughter a lot. I make all these monkey noises and she just can't help liking them!"

"I understand, Mr Andersen. Heck, I like monkeys too." Jordan said. "But Dad doesn't like monkeys though. He hates the way they hold their food in their hand-like feet and how they eat bugs off of their furry bodies and-

Jordan's eyes popped wide when he saw Bill. In a heartbeat, or perhaps even less, there was a sudden poof, and Bill's ears had suddenly grown big and round, almost monkey-like.

"I am sorry your dad does not like monkeys. Lots of people do not like those animals," Bill said, hardly noticing thick fur in the colour of his hair forming on his arms, on his neck, and on the back of his hands. "But not me!" he said excitedly, as his hair began to get a bit unruly. "I loved monkeys when I was your age." He even did some of his monkey noises to impress Jordan. Suddenly, he looked at his shirt, which somehow looked bigger on him.

Jordan looked, then gasped in shock. "You... you've got a tail!"

Bill looked at his butt, and he gasped in shock too. He saw from his pants [which had slipped down a bit] that a brown monkey tail as long as his arm, was curving out from behind his back, just a bit above his butt.

He saw that he was now no higher than the table top. "Agh!" He screeched. "What's happening to me?!" He fell onto his rear, and after pulling off his shoes and socks, he watched in shock and amusement, as his toes extended to be as long as his fingers, and then his feet became like the shape of his hands. Jordan could only watch as Bill stripped down to nothing, shrinking down to half his size, and gaining more fur on his body. He could feel his vocal cords crack, so he could only blurt out monkey screeches.

Jordan stared down at the monkey that had Bill's face, and fur in the colour of his human form's hair, sitting on his human form's discarded clothing. "Mr Andersen? Are you ok?"

Whenever a human changes shape, their Headquarters changes with it. Bill Andersen's Emotions had all become the same form he had; all wearing black neckties, like they were before, and their fur was in the colours of the emotions; yellow for Joy, blue for Sadness, red for Anger, green for Disgust, and purple for Fear, respectively.

the Headquarters of Monkey Bill Andersen was designed like Tarzan's treehouse from the Tarzan film.

The Joy Monkey pressed a coconut-like button on a wooden console, sending a siren, that sounded like monkey screeches, ringing through the monkey Bill's mind.

In the real world, Monkey Bill hooted happily, and jumped into Jordan's arms. Jordan giggled as he petted Monkey Bill.

His fingers were elongating, just like his toes! Roger was surprised.

He had no idea he was turning into a bat. He suddenly gasped, as he felt his body get a little bit skinnier, like he was losing weight.
1553322222222221222211221211.title: the tf continues

15533222222222212222112212111.content:
Roger stood, staring down at his suit, which now seemed looser on him. He carefully took it off, stripping down to nothing.

it's not long after he did that the second change was upon him. Coarse, pricking hair appears in very small patches along his shoulders, back, and around his hips. His fingers ached something fierce... and then, before his eyes, his already deformed hands become worse - the fingers growing longer... and longer.

Meanwhile, his already thin frame only seems to become thinner - perhaps the mass necessary for his finger (and now ear) growth. His legs become very thin, and he heard joints popping as his legs seemed to push themselves strangely out to the sides. His feet become even more bat-like, his big toe almost a servicable thumb now that his hands had become so ungainly.

His nose, suddenly pushed up severely and flattened into an odd leaf-like shape. Two other teeth lengthen and joined his front nosferatu-like chompers. All the while, his face widens and changes, becoming much more bat-like, although no fur or other masking features or features that would 'soften' the overall fugly bat-face grew in.
15533222222222212222112212111.title: the tf continues

155332222222222122221122121111.content:
Mayor Roger was now really frightened. He cowered under his table in fright at the animal he'd become.

Almost as quickly as the last change, the next change began:

a thick webbing begins to grow between each digit in his hands, and then all along both sides of his arm. It stretches, thickens and and discolors to a dark brown.

When the webbing finishes growing, he felt your hips ache as your legs, momentarily, disjoint, the flexibility increasing drastically, allowing Pangborn to swivel his legs around completely backwards... likewise his big toes gained in strength, allowing him, if he wished, to grasp something with his feet much stronger than his hands now can... and support his body weight.

Finally, he felt his back itch as thin, bristly fur covered his shoulders and over the top part of his back.
155332222222222122221122121111.title: the tf continues

fur began to spread over most of his body. Short, thick, wiry brown hair.

His ears stretch even bigger, and the webbing thickens and grows between his digits thicker. Even between his legs! It feels strong, and his arms stretch and reformatted with popping joints to better support him.

His nose widens and pushes up even more, bringing an array of scents to you, and his pupils expanded, filling the visable portion of his eyes. And the "thumbs" of his big toes became completely opposable, and while perhaps not quite as dexterous as his original hands, they aren't a bad substitution.

By the end of it, he actually was able to glide for short distances. He can't climb his way into the sky from the ground, but he can hop. More like short gliding jumps than anything, but with the right wind currents and a lot of practice, he can touch the sky again.

Mayor Roger was now a bat!

"Don't worry, dear." Agent K said. "I'm well trained." She aimed her laser blaster, which was designed like a camera, at Prince Cinnamon Boots and then...

"Say cheese." she said. PCB brayed in response. "Uhhh... close enough." Agent K said, and pressed the flash button. "I can't look!" Riley said, covering her eyes.

A big laser shot outta the camera, and zapped PCB. there was a long silence. then, before you could say 'Hey Presto', all the fleas on PCB vanished into thin air!

"Sweet!" Riley said. "Thanks Mom!"

Agent K grinned. "Well, I couldn't have done it with my new laser bl-" she stopped. the camera blaster had gone!!!

and guess who had got it? That's right! It was Dick Daring. And he was near Prince Cinnamon Boots. "I'll take a pic of you being completely flea-free!" he said. He held the camera in one hand, and with his other hand, he got PCB into a headlock.

155332222222222221211111.content:
It was right around noon, on a sunny summer day at Adventure Bay. Ryder, Chase and Rocky were on their way back to The Lookout, after having handled a problem involving littering, and some playful squirrels at the picnic site.

They were just about out of the forest, when Chase noticed some kind of flash of light, out of the corner of his eye.

"Ryder!" he called out. "I just saw something!"

"What did you see, Chase?" Ryder called back.

"I don't know, but there was something there; I'm sure of it, ruff!"

"Okay, then. Let's find out what it was!" replied Ryder. He then spoke to Rocky: "Rocky, do you mind heading back to The Lookout without us? Chase and I have to investigate something."

"I don't mind at all," was Rocky's answer. "That way, I can get in some more practice for our Pup Pup Boogie tournament this afternoon."

"Okay, we'll see you later!" called Ryder, as he and Chase turned around, while Rocky continued on.

"Alright, Chase," said Ryder, "What did you see and where did you see it?"

"Well, it was a strange flash of light," replied Chase, "and it came from that direction, ruff." He nodded in the said direction, which was down a side-road.

"Great!" said Ryder. "Lead the way, Chase!"

"Chase is on the case! Ruff!" Chase replied. He proceeded to take point as they drove down the side-road. They hadn't been driving for long, when a message came in on Ryder's Pup-Pad. It was from Katie.

"Ryder, where are you? Rocky just came back and said that you and Chase had been delayed."

"Yeah, sorry about that, Katie," Ryder apologized. "Chase saw something strange and we're just going to investigate what it was."

"Well, just don't take too long," said Katie. "Remember, you promised that we could go to the new swimming-pool together, this afternoon."

"Don't worry, I'll be there in time," Ryder assured her. "It's just a quick investigation; what could go wrong?"

"Okay, then I guess I'll see you later," said Katie and hung up the call.

"Ryder, ruff! We're here!" called Chase. He had stopped his vehicle in front of a small crater at the side of the road. Ryder parked his ATV right next to it and they both disembarked from their vehicles and walked over to see what was in the crater.

As it turned out, it was some kind of rock, about the size of a soccer ball. It was clear that this rock was the source of the flash from earlier; it was still glowing with a faint, white light.

"Ryder, ruff, what is that?" asked Chase.

"It looks like some kind of meteorite," replied Ryder. "But, I have never seen one that glowed like that."

"Then why don't we take a closer look?" said Chase.

"Good idea," agreed Ryder. Both Ryder and Chase reached out to touch the meteorite and touched it at the same time.

As soon as they touched the meteorite, the glowing intensified. Somehow, Ryder and Chase were just standing there, frozen like statues, and in some kind of trance. Then, a transparent version of Chase flew out of his motionless body, and a transparent version of Ryder flew out of his motionless body. The transparent Ryder and Chase floated over their own bodies for a few seconds. Then suddenly, the transparent Ryder flew into Chase's body, and the transparent Chase flew into Ryder's body!

When this was over with, the meteorite stopped glowing completely, looking like a plain old meteorite now, as 'Ryder' and 'Chase' slowly came to.

Whose Point Of Wiew do we follow now?
155332222222222221211111.title: A strange meteorite, with a stranger power...

155332222222222222121.content:
OK.

For those of you who don't know who he is, I'd better explain:

Alphonse Perrier du von Scheck is a fictional character on Hey Arnold!, and the main antagonist of Hey Arnold!: The Movie.
While Scheck originally appears to be a nice if somewhat treacherous developer, he is eventually revealed to be downright manipulative and cruel. He wants to tear down Arnold's neighborhood and build a shopping mall over it, because a historical incident occurred there that sullied his family name. He is extremely quarrelsome, argumentative, opprobrious, and truculent, as he confronts Arnold and Gerald revealing his true intentions for bulldozing their neighborhood.

Scheck is not just dishonorable and corrupt; he is not above burning the document declaring the neighborhood a historical landmark, trying to stop a bus with children on it by ordering the overpass that they are driving on to be blown up, and being completely willing to run down a crowd of people (including children) with his car, makes him an attempted murderer.

He is a direct descendant of Archibald Von Scheck, the British colonial governor of the Hillwood area during the Tomato Incident. It is likely that Archibald Von Scheck was a Hessian.

Scheck is the CEO of moving realtor company Future Tech Industries and wants to build a mall in Arnold's neighborhood and places a huge screen called the "Scheckivision" counting down the days till demolition. Nick Vermicelli answers directly to him. He keeps a document that declares the place a landmark hidden in a safe deposit box. When Arnold and Gerald confront Scheck of having the document that declares the neighborhood a landmark he denies having it and kicks the boys out of his office. The boys soon realize Scheck is lying and eventually manage to steal the key to the cabinet from Nick Vermecelli. When Vermecelli notices the key is gone, he alerts Scheck.

Arnold and Gerald infiltrate FTi and locate the vault, only to find the document missing. Scheck appears from behind them with the document in his hand. He reveals that his ancestor, the leader of the British forces, was humiliated by the Tomato Incident, and that for years, Scheck has been planning to avenge his family by tearing down Arnold's neighborhood and replacing it with a hulking building carrying the Scheck name. He then burns the document to ensure that his plans will proceed, before summoning his guards to get rid of Arnold and Gerald. They manage to get away, and are sure that they have failed, until Deep Voice (later revealed to be Helga) convinces Arnold to obtain FTi security-camera footage of Scheck burning the document, which Arnold does.

When Scheck sees the kids escaping with the footage of him burning the document and boarding bus #13, he roars with rage and phones Nick to stop the children before taking the chase. Scheck orders Nick to blow the overpass but the bus manages to jump the hole. Arnold eventually shows the workers and residence the footage. Mayor Dixie declares it a national landmark to everyone's delight. Just then Scheck arrives in his car demanding his workers to demolish the neighborhood, but they refuse, angrily pointing to the evidence on the screen. The angry crowd then march at him, forcing Scheck to reenter his car. When Scheck sees Arnold and Gerald right in front of him, he tries to mow them down, only to discover that Arnold's Grandma has stripped his car off its tires. Scheck is then arrested for his crimes.


Now, he was in his prison cell, sketching loads of rude words on the wall of his cell about Arnold, the 'football headed boy' who foiled his plans.
All over the wall were gazillions of rude swear words, some of which would make even the swear words from the Spongebob ep 'Sailor Mouth' and the swear word heard in the Arthur episode 'Bleep' seem pleasant to hear.
They were all surrounding a crudely drawn picture of Arnold, with cross marks where his eyes should be.

"I'm gonna get my revenge on that football head even if it's the last thing i do!" he griped.

Then suddenly, a piece of paper flew into his cell. out of curiosity, he picked it up, and read it, making sure to keep an eye out for any guards who saw what he was up to.

There were words on the piece of paper, which read;

"I HEARD YOU WANT REVENGE,
AND IF YOU WANNA GET OUTTA HERE,
WATCH FOR THE MAGIC DUST
WHEN THIS NOTE SHALL DISAPPEAR!"

Then, the paper seemed to vanish in a cloud of dust, covering him, and FILLING THE CELL WITH MAGIC DUST.

He thought he saw a bit of glittery dust on his arm, but it soon quickly faded.

suddenly, Scheck began to....

15533222222222222221111131333.content:
Perhaps Tommy somehow ends up swapping bodies with an inanimate object?

If so, then there's a few things to consider.
First: If Tommy were to swap bodies with an object that has any moving parts, (like a Reptarr action figure, a toy car, a real car, ect.), Tommy's conciousness will allow him to move around in the way that the object would move. (Ergo; if he swaps with an action figure, he will only be able to move the figures limbs in the way that they can be moved).
However; if the object he swaps with has an external method of moving it, (like; a remote controlled car), then it would now make Tommy's
now-lifeless human body move, instead of the object that Tommy is in.

Second: If Tommy were to swap bodies with an object that can't move at all, (like a chair, a table, a lamp, ect.) then Tommy won't be able to move either.

Third: If Tommy were to swap bodies with an article of clothing, (either one part, or the full outfit) then he IS able to move the body of whoever is wearing said clothes and only the parts that he covers. Also, if the clothes in question are designed to be trown out, (i. e. diapers), then Tommy's conciousness will transfer into the new article, once the old one is used.

So; what kind of inanimate object should Tommy swap with?
15533222222222222221111131333.title: Inanimate Swap?

155332222222222222211122221.content:
OK THEN, LET'S DO IT.

While on a trip to a movie studio, Tommy, Chuckie, Phil, Lil, Angelica, Susie, and Dil ventured away from the grownups, and into a prop storage area to get away from the heat. But in the process, Dil got locked behind a door, and the security guard lost the keys to the door thanks to Dil himself.

The Rugrats set off on an adventure to find the missing keys and rescue Dil. They had lots of adventures in the sets, searching for the keys. They headed into a pirate film set, a race stadium film set, a space film set, and a Western film set.

Soon, they got enough to get past the door... only to be stopped by a backup security door. But they found the right hole that opened the door, and were now able to go on. The security guard set off to get Dil, but Angelica suggested they'd go and find Dil themselves. They adventured into 2 different sets, whilst Shirley Lock Holmes [Angelica] and Okey-Dokey Jones [Tommy] found the last of the keys, and now they'd reached the top-secret set where Dil had headed.

SO WHEN WOULD THE SECURITY GUARD TF?

15533222222222222221112222121.content:
The security guard was there too, setting up a camera platform. "I just gotta make a few more adjustments to this camera platform, then it'll be ready for the big chase scene through Reptar Park." he said. But he started feeling hot all of a sudden. "Phew! But if I stay out in the sun any longer, I'm gonna turn into a giant lizard!"

But then he started feeling... odd. Was it a heatstroke? Was it sunburn? Was it a belly ache? He felt his belly growling like mad. Just then, there was a loud tearing sound. He heard it, looked round, and saw a huge lizard tail sprouting from his butt.

"Hey! What the-"

He saw his hands swelling and shaking. Then he saw his belly growing, and forcing the buttons of his shirt off. He saw his exposed belly, and watched in horror as green scaly splotches formed on it. His shoes swelled, then burst, exposing his bare feet, as they grew bigger. The shape of his body changed, and his clothes began to tear.

He was frightened. "Wh-wh-what's happening to meeeeeaaarghhh!"

His scream turned into a fierce blood-curdling guttural roar, and his clothes tore off. the security guard-turned-dinosaur emerged, about the size of the Reptar-bot seen in the game, and looking really fierce and scary. The only thing that remained of the security guard's human form was his stretched-looking underwear. He roared loudly.

15533222222222222221121113133111211.content:
Tommy and Chuckie were having fun. They were in the middle of 'exploring' Tommy's house when they both took a look outside.

They observed a much MUCH older kid having fun with other kids his age. From what the two friends could see, the older kid were having even more fun than they were.

"Golly; I would like to be like that olderer kid out there," said Tommy to Chuckie, "if only so I could have just as much fun playing with you, Chuckie."

What the two young friends didn't know, was that a tiny fairy had been watching them and heard what Tommy had said, but misinterpreted it as meaning that Tommy wanted to keep his very young mind but have a much older body.

Deciding to grant the (to her) misinterpreted wish, the fairy waved her wand at Tommy and then vanished.

Tommy didn't notice anything was amiss, until Chuckie said: "Err, Tommy? Why do you seem biggerer?"

Tommy then noticed that he WAS a tiny bit bigger than he had been just a moment ago.

But before the two babies could do anything else other than staring, Tommy's changes suddenly accelerated.

Tommy felt really uncomfortable as his diaper and shirt began to feel tighter and tighter.

He watched in equal parts curiosity and horror as his body continued to rapidly grow all over.
His arms, legs, head and the rest of his body grew longer while also increasing in muscle mass, loosing their baby fat in the process.

Tommy's mouth and head started to hurt, as both teeth and hair began to grow in. Tough Tommy was overwhelmed by these changes, he did manage to realize that he was rapidly getting a lot older!

Nearing three years old, Tommy's shirt and daiper now felt incredibly tight on him; but it was only when he reached four years that they finally gave up the ghost and ripped off his growing body.

Freed from the constricing clothes, Tommy's body began to grow even MORE rapidly, going from that of a four-year old to that of a six-year old in a matter of seconds.

Chuckie could only stare in shock as his rapidly aging friend as Tommy continued to grow in both age and size, rapidly passing seven, eight and nine years old.

As Tommy's body passed ten years of age the changes began to slow down a little, but it didn't stop until Tommy's body had aged to fourteen years old, leaving both Chuckie and the 14-year-old-bodied Tommy speechless for a few moments.

Tommy recovered first. "W-what just happened...?" he asked, only to pause when he noticed his voice sounded older, too.

"Y-you got olderer," stuttered Chuckie, "A lot olderer! But how did that happen?"

"I d-don't know," answered Tommy. "Maybe my wish came true... err... hey! If I am olderer, how come I can still understand you?"

"I have no idea," replied Chuckie. He then grinned as he realized something. "Hey; since you are olderer now, you could read all that story that we both like, right?"

"I guess..." muttered Tommy. Chuckie walked over and picked up his and Tommy's favorite storybook, bringing it back to the now much older boy.

It took Tommy a few moments before he got used enough to his longer arms, but he picked up and opened the book as soon as he was able to. Unfortunatly, Tommy soon found out that he still didn't understand any of the letters in the book, much less the words.

He told this to Chuckie.

"That is strange," said Chuckie. "You should be able to read now you are olderer, but you can't." Chuckie thought hard about it. "Maybe it was only your body that got olderer, with your smartness staying normal."

"Soooo, I have the look of an olderer child," said Tommy, "but I am still normal on the inside?"

"I think so," was the reply.

The two friends didn't say anything else for a bit, letting the fact that Tommy was now a big kid with a much younger mind fully sink in. Then Tommy started to shiver.

"Chuckie; I feel cold," said Tommy.

"Yeah; your clothes did not grow with you," said Chuckie.

Looking down past his new, bigger body, Tommy saw the shredded remains of his shirt and diaper.

"Waaaah; I'm nakie!" exclaimed Tommy. Though he had tried being nude before, he had now understood that he should not be so, unless he was about to have a bath.

"There is another shirt over here," said Chuckie and held it up so Tommy could see it.

"Can you help me get it on?" asked Tommy.

"Sure," replied Chuckie. But, even though he tried his best, Tommy's shirt just wouldn't fit over his much larger head; it was much too small now!

"Sorry, Tommy," apologized Chuckie. "You are too big to fit this anymore."

"But I can not go nakie again," whined Tommy. "What do we do now?"

"Don't worry," said Chuckie. "I saw something that might fit you in a box in your dad's closet. I'll go get it!"

"Please, hurry," pleaded Tommy.

Chuckie turned around and began running out of the room as fast as he could, leaving the 1-year-old with the body of a 14-year-old sitting alone in the room, sitting on the remains of his clothes.

"What should I do while I wait for Chuckie?" wondered Tommy.

1553322222222222222112222213121.content:
Tommy was annoyed. It was nighttime and he had been put in his crib by his parents, but he couldn't sleep. The reason was that he couldn't stop thinking about how his spoiled cousin, Angelica, had been mean to him and the other babies today.

"Angelica is a big meanie," grumbled Tommy to himself. "She is olderer than the rest of us, but she should still not be a meanie! If I was Angelica, I would be nicer to us." Tommy closed his eyes and tried to sleep again, this time succeding. His last words before he fell asleep was: "If only Angelica could know how it feels when she is mean to us...for one...day..."

Unbeknownst to Tommy, a couple of fairies had heard what he said and decided to grant him what he wanted, but no in the way he expected. One of the faries flew out the window and over to another house, entering through another open window and into the bedroom of Angelica, who was also sound asleep, sending a magical signal to the fairy in Tommy's room.

In two different houses, two fairies waved their wands at the same time. In Tommy's room, a transparent copy of the toddler came out of his body and floated in front of the fairy. The same thing happened to Angelica in her room. The see-through copies of the two young children was their souls.

With the souls extracted from the bodies, the two faries flew out the windows and over to where the other fairy had been, with Tommy's and Angelica's souls floating after them, so that the fairy that extracted Tommy's soul was now in Angelica's room, while the fairy that extracted Angelica's soul was now in Tommy's room.

With another magical signal, the two fairies once more waved their wands. In Angelica's room, Tommy's soul entered the body of the 3-year old girl, Angelica, while in Tommy's room, Angelica's soul entered the body of the 1-year old boy, Tommy.

Meeting up with each other outside, the two faries congratulated each other for what they had thought was a good idea, before flying off.

Little did the faries know, that putting a 1-year old boy toddler in the body of a 3-year old girl and putting a 3-year old girl in the body of a 1-year old boy toddler, would be garanteed to cause many awkward moments for the both of them...

Who wakes up first the following morning?

15533222222222222221221221222222221.content:
One day at school, Pangborn was reading the newspaper. It was then he saw a message written in it: It was written in Latin and translated to "Seek the monster within thy self."

"Pretty strange," thought Pangborn. "I wonder what it means?"

Just then he felt his legs begin to lengthen. A second later his shoulders moved apart and his arms began to grow. His clothes were quickly reduced to shreds and the paper fell to the floor.

It fell from his hands as the fingers quickly reformed into talons. A tail began to grow from his back, forcing him out of the chair and onto the floor. The bones in his legs reformed and muscles grew around them. The same happened with his arms. He could feel his neck lengthen and his head grow heavy. A pair of wings sprouted from his shoulders. With a shock, he felt the change start to affect his manhood, but he relaxed when it grew in size, and retreated into a newly formed sheath.

He face felt like modeling clay. His nose and mouth were drawn outwards, forcing his eyes slightly to the sides. Razor sharp teeth extended from his gums and his eyes changed to slitted orbs. He felt himself grow inside and a ridge of spines extend from the top of his head, down his back, to the tip of his tail. Finally, a covering a scales sprouted from his skin, hardening to armor plating within seconds.

Then all was still.

The beast which had been Vice Principal Estes Pangborn, slowly moved its great head from the sandy floor of the room. He let out a loud roar.

Dipper tried to get over Wendy, really. He solved mysteries, kept working on the journals, kept his mind occupied. But he'd see her at work and this whole mess of feelings would rise up inside him and he didn't know where to direct the energy.

So it was time he did something about it.

It was mid-afternoon. He'd manage to grab one of her hairs (in a non-creepy way), some mysterious items from Grunkle Stan's gift shop, and stuck it all into a pot. If the Journal was correct, he should be able to gain insight into Wendy's life by drinking this elixir. And he triple checked: no chance of body swapping. He just wanted to understand her better. Maybe put this all behind her.

He grimaced at the brew and it's green, bubbling contents. "This is probably a huge mistake. It feels like it should be a big mistake."

1553322222222222222222222221221.content:
ok.

Lord Howie it is.

for those of you who don't know who he is:

He appeared in the ep 'Pound of the Baskervilles'. and here's the story:

Every night, a dog named MacDuff belonging to Roger Baskerville would enter Baskerville Manor to search for his late father's lost will which would prove that he's the rightful owner of the place but his dastardly older brother, Howie would prevent it from happening and always suffered allergies from the dog or any other animal fur. Because such evidence was never found, Howie kept oppressing his brother and reduced him to working as his servant.

One stormy night, after the Rescue Rangers accidentally crash land into Baskerville Manor, they come across MacDuff running away from Lord Howie, who got bitten by him on the rear, chasing and trying to shoot him. When McDuff returns to Roger, Lord Howie, having had enough of his brother's dog, calls the sheriff to take him away first thing in the morning.

Willing to help MacDuff find the will and avoid being taken away, the Rescue Rangers come up with a plan on how to scare Lord Howie out of the manor. Lord Howie is seen sleeping until he is awoken and intimidated by strange noises, the wind, and MacDuff dressed as a ghost dog. However, Lord Howie's allergies reveal the trick. Lord Howie tends to finish MacDuff off once and for all. Luckily, the Rescue Rangers rescue him and manage to hide from Lord Howie behind a mirror leading to a secret passageway; thanks to Chip and his love for Surelock Jones whose books he reads .

After they find the will, Lord Howie seizes it and attempts to burn it but the Rangers open the windows to allow the wind to extinguish the fire and get the will. As MacDuff runs back to bring Roger, Lord Howie tries to catch and later shoot the Rescue Rangers.

Once he gets the will again and Roger arrives at the manor with MacDuff, Lord Howie finally confesses that he knew their father had indeed left the place to Roger since he was always his favorite son and threatens to destroy the will, continue oppressing his brother or kick him out on the streets with MacDuff, and take MacDuff away.

Luckily, MacDuff seizes the will but gets caught by the sheriff. Lord Howie does everything he can to prevent his brother from getting and showing the will to the sheriff and getting MacDuff back. Then, the Rescue Rangers finally manage to show the wiĺl to the sheriff and Roger is made the new lord of his old home with a responsibility concerning MacDuff; much to Lord Howie's chagrin when throwing a tantrum.

It is unknown as to what happened to Lord Howie after Roger claimed rightful ownership of Baskerville Manor. However, it can be presumed that he probably got arrested by the sheriff for all of his lies and treachery.

here's his profile from the Disney Wiki: http://disney.wikia.com/wiki/Carver_Desc...

Carver René Descartes is the self-proclaimed "cool guy" of the group in The Weekenders. He is an African American who has a strong interest in clothes and fashion (particularly shoes). Although he appreciates spending time with his friends, Carver desperately and hopelessly wants to be one of the cool kids and, ultimately, to become a celebrity. He is shown to be a little self-centered and annoying and can be immensely shallow and superficial towards women: he once rejected a girl just because she was too tall. Thus, the more touching moments of the show are when he is altruistic and battles his own insecurity. Carver often makes bad choices. One of the many notable jokes about Carver is that he secretly owns and tries on women's clothing, making him pretty strange. However, he usually (nervously) responds that the clothing is his sister's. Carver also has a younger brother named Todd, a toddler stuck in his terrible twos, who often torments Carver and often, by extension, his friends. He sometimes goes to his sister, Penny, for advice, but she frequently ignores his questions. Carver's head is often compared to a pineapple for humorous effect. Carver is sometimes noted for his horrible handwriting, which often leads to people reading words much different from his intentions.

FOR THOSE WHO DON'T KNOW

'The series will revolve around Milo Murphy, a boy who lives "a couple of neighborhoods over from Phineas and Ferb"[4], and is the descendant of the namesake of "Murphy's Law".

Milo is the personification of Murphy’s Law where anything that can go wrong will go wrong. Suffering from Extreme Hereditary Murphy’s Law condition (EHML), Milo always looks to make the best of the cards he’s been dealt and his endless optimism and enthusiasm can turn any catastrophe into a wild adventure. Armed with knowledge, a backpack full of supplies and his fearless friends, Melissa and Zack, Milo is always prepared for every possibility. Together, he and his friends will learn that it’s all about a positive attitude and not to sweat the big stuff… and it’s all big stuff.'

1553322222222222222222222222222223222221.content:
Mr Drako was getting a MRI, [hopefully a better one than in 'Worked Day'].

"Um, Mr. Drako, I'll need you to put your arms at your sides, not crossed over your chest like that." the nurse said.
"Are you sure? This feels so... unnatural." Mr Drako said.
"I'm sure. Besides, the problem's been corrected since last time; you don't have to worry." the nurse said.
"Well, you're the professional." Mr Drako said.

THe machine started, and for once, it seemed that it was gonna go well, without Murphy's Law ruining it [for once].
Suddenly, the machine made a strange whirring noise.
"Oops. My bad. I'll uncross my arms." Mr Drako said.

Suddenly the MRI MACHINE Malfunctioned, and suddenly, Mr Drako began to shrink!

The hospital robe he was wearing didn't shrink with him.
"Oh my god, what is happening to meeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee...." Mr Drako said as he got smaller and smaller and smaller.

Eventually, the machine stopped and Mr Drako sat up. then he stood up, still feeling dizzy.
He looked down at his naked body. "Holy cow!" he exclaimed. "I'm tiny! and I'm naked!"

The nude Drako clambered off the huge bed, and scampered outta the room, struggling to pull the door open.

Lucy was in the basement, when she found a book.
She picked it up and there was a spell.
She read it aloud:

May the youngest in your family,
Have their soul intersect,
With the person with the lowest level of intellect.

"What does that mean?" said Lucy.
Unfortunately, it meant that Lily and Leni would swap bodies.
Who first notices something is up?

1553322222222222222222222222222223222222.content:
"Help!" said Lily from her and Lisa's floor, "Everything's got bigger and my voice is higher!"
Nobody could hear, though, as Luna was playing music very loudly and Lisa was in the kitchen making herself a snack.
Lily walked out the door (which, thankfully, was open, and into the hallway and saw Leni.
"Aah! A giant me!" she shouted.
Leni, whose body was being occupied by Lily, sat on the floor looking confused, and then she wet herself.
"Eeew," said Lily/Leni, "Giant Me should wear a diaper," and she walked into her and Lisa's room and got a diaper and some wipes.

When Lori came out of her and Leni's room, she saw Leni, who had now been wiped clean, surrounded by urine-soaked baby wipes, with a wet pair of briefs on the floor and a puddle of pee, and Lily trying to put a way-too-small diaper on Leni.

1553322222222222222222222222222223222222.content:
One day, the Mane Six and Spike were exploring in a rocky region, and came across a cave.
"Shall we go in?" asked Rainbow Dash.
"No, I'm too scared," said Fluttershy, cowering.
"I'm with you, sugarcane," said Applejack.
Pinkie Pie wanted to go in, but agreed with Twilight when she stated that they'd better stick together.
And as for Rarity, she was worried she'd get dirty.

"Well, we don't mind getting dirty," said Spike.
"And we're not scared," said Rainbow Dash.
So they entered the cave.
"Don't you think we should listen to Twilight?" asked Fluttershy, but they didn't hear her.

In the cave, they came across a magical crystal.

Someone reached out to touch it, but who?

1553322222222222222222222222222223222222.content:
Bob found the loss of his age, a fact he could feel as his body contracted and pulsed, rather invigorating. This distracted him from the fact now he’d already reached a college-aged young adulthood and was continuing to grow younger as he began to shrink. His clothes loosened, and sagged, as his hips, thighs and buttocks shrank in mass as well. Soon he could barely be considered “of college age” anymore as he looked more like a beanpole freshman or a high school student visiting campus with his tall gangly body with large hands and feet. He hadn’t had a boner this good last this long in a long time, and he didn’t want it to stop.

The high school aged teen now began to shrink in different ways, namely in height. In a sudden burst, Bob nearly found himself fall over as he lost almost a foot of growth rather quickly as puberty began to truly be undone. His hands and feet also began to shrink.

Bob stripped down to his nakedness, and lay down on the floor, as he basked in the sensation and pleasure of getting younger. He let out a long sigh, which began low and shifted up an octave as his adam’s apple shrank into non-existence, returning him to the body of himself at eleven years of age, feeling rather contented and basking in the afterglow.

The youthening however did not stop, nor did Bob’s shrinking as he soon was leaving the double digits of his life for the single digits. Fingers and toes grew stubbier, baby fat began to appear on his tummy and his face, and the skinny boy shrank more and more in size as toddlerhood beckoned and then was achieved. His eyes seemed larger as his skull grew smaller around them, and his messy hair seemed longer and adorable on his shrinking head.

Before too long, however, he had surpassed toddlerhood for infancy.

It all began one day, when Bob got up, and got out of bed.

After his shower, it was about now that he felt funny. he started feeling hot.
Hot, and itchy.

'What gives?' he wondered, scratching the back of his neck and discovering that he was in need of a haircut.
He looked at his hand and saw that his fingernails were now much longer, and all ended in sharp points.
'That ain't right. Maybe I'm hallucinating,' Bob erroneously surmised, but as he went to absentmindedly bite a nail, he discovered that it wasn't just his fingernails that were growing. Some of his teeth were now much longer and sharper too.
I don't understand. What—

1553322222222222222222222222222223222222.content:
ok.
for those who don't know what it is:

Stanley is an American animated television series that aired on Playhouse Disney based on the series of children's books written by "Griff" (as indicated on the cover of the original book), also known as Andrew Griffin. It was produced by Cartoon Pizza and was developed for television by Jim Jinkins (the creator of Doug, PB&J Otter, Allegra's Window, JoJo's Circus, and Pinky Dinky Doo) and David Campbell.

Stanley teaches a wide variety of issues preschool children face, including change, growth, rules, and dealing with others. Each episode centers on an animal that deals with or helps explain the issue Stanley is grappling with.

Each episode shows Stanley (voiced by Jessica D. Stone) in a situation he does not fully understand. He discusses it with his pet goldfish Dennis (Charles Shaughnessy) before consulting the Great Big Book of Everything, a remarkably complete zoology book aimed at young children or his computer. By observing how an animal copes with the same situation Stanley faces, or how it can overcome a similar difficulty, Stanley learns to deal with the situation himself.

Throughout the show Stanley and all his preschool aged friends are able to talk to his pet cat, Elsie (Hynden Walch) and dog Harry (Rene Mujica) as well as Dennis. Other animals also seem to occasionally respond, but never talk or give a definite indication they truly understood what was said. Stanley and his friends actively try to keep the adults (that is, except Stanley's grandmother), and by extension Stanley's older brother Lionel, from realizing this.

The Great Big Book of Everything appears to be magical in nature, able to either let the animals out of the pages or allow the children to enter, sometimes changing them into animals in the process. This does not appear to be imaginary since occasionally adults do notice the noise, and Stanley works hard to hide the animals. There is also an episode where Stanley's brother sees a T-Rex in the yard but dismisses the memory when it disappears back into the book.

The Halloween special features Stanley's grandmother who, it is implied, is a witch. She reveals that she too can work the book, and in fact was the one who gave it to Stanley. She was also the one who taught its theme song to Harry and Elsie.

When someone says the "Great Big Book of Everything", hints it out, or even has the book, Elsie and Harry will wake up or find their way into the scene and start singing. This usually annoys Dennis, who after the introductory verse, says something like "Oh not again!"

The episodes, "Growing Pains," "Time for Toolfish," and "Pearls of Wisdom," show Harry, Stanley's pet dog, in a swimsuit.

1553322222222222222222222222222223222222.content:
Okay; so, Kit somehow ends up swapping his own clothes (a green sweatshirt, white shirt/turtle neck and a blue-and-red baseball cap worn backwards) with those of little Molly Cunningham (a pair of lavender overalls, frilly white panties, a pink polo shirt and two hairbows), but what causes this to happen?


Option 1: After a discussion between them concerning what boys wear vs. what girls wear, Kit makes a bet with Molly where, if he looses, he has to wear whatever Molly wants him to wear for a whole day. When he does loose, Molly wants Kit to wear her own clothes for the day; something that becomes both difficult and embarrassing for Kit, since Molly's clothes are not only girly but also quite small for him, which makes them difficult for Kit to put on.
However; in spite of his current situation, Kit points out that Molly can't go around naked all day, which in turn forces Molly to wear the only clothes available at the moment: Kit's clothes! This becomes awkward for Molly, too, since Kit's clothes are much too big for her, with Kit's sweatshirt alone being big enough to cover her entire body, bar her head!

Option 2: After bringing another mystical idol back to Higher for Hire, Molly tries to take a peek at it. Remembering what happened with the last mystical idol, Kit tries to stop her, but is too late to prevent her from touching it, activating it's magic.
Fortunately for Kit, this idol doesn't swap bodies; just clothes... only, he swaps with Molly!
Even though the clothes are re-sized to fit them perfectly, both Kit and Molly still feel uncomfortable wearing each other's clothes, despite the fact that everyone else regards it as normal.
However; when they try to get back to normal, they find that Baloo is about to fly it off to the client, forcing the two cubs to follow him on the journey.
